reference.shortdesc: A term is a word or phrase that has specific meanings in certain contexts. It might have or require extended definitions or explanations.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The keyref attribute can be used in conjunction with the term element to accomplish the following:

ul.li: Supply the text content for the term element
Associate a term with a resource, typically a definition of the term
